name: Pointless Castle Defense Game
description:
Hi Everyone

Welcome to the pointless castle defense game where you will have to fight off invading monsters.

****Disclaimer: This demo is only to show off the map and get a feel for the map. I will be adding in the game play. Depending on time and funding. More funding = more time I can spend developing systems.****

Next planned update:

Custom character.

Troll enemy.

Basic attacking system.

Game-play:

You only have the ability to fight. No power ups and no way out.

Future updates:

Multiplayer.

More enemies.

Ability to add defenses to help with defense.

Extras

Any donations would be very much appreciated. Also if you guys enjoy this game then maybe I'll make it into a full on playable map with a food and quest system.
